front.title: Fault Management for the MPLS Transport Profile

abstract.t: This draft specifies a fault management mechanism for MPLS Transport Profile(MPLS-TP) Label Switched Path (LSP). The proposed mechanism is based on a generic way of notifying a Maintenance End Point (MEP) or Maintenance Intermediate Point (MIP) of a fault on an MPLS-TP LSP using new type of MPLS Operation, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) messages.
